interlinear-text.item: Recorded by Husniya Khujamyorova, July 2016, Vrang, Tajikistan.

phrase.item: Satkək (name of a bead), there are one or two, every time I say dear mother,
Oh brother, seven rains are upon my face.
rain is a metaphor here for tears
Oh brother, seven rains are upon my face.
I sing for you as a nightingale, oh brother,
Oh my sweet brother is going for a journey, oh brother.
Who knows whether he is thirsty or hungry.
Who knows whether he is thirsty or hungry, oh
I sing for you as a nightingale, oh I sing
When I go out toward the shrine, oh brother,
I long for my parents' house, oh brother,
I long for my parents house.
I sing for you as a nightingale, oh brother.
